experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Built a dynamic article management system using Next.js, React, ShadCN UI, Redux, and RTK Query that enables seamless content updates with an intuitive admin interface.
Integrated .NET Core and PostgreSQL, optimising RESTful APIs and queries to improve system performance by 40%.
Streamlined deployments by 30% by implementing Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines and Agile workflows, making releases faster and more scalable.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Built and optimised full-stack solutions by integrating NestJS, Node.js, MongoDB, React, Vite, Axios, and Redux, supporting 1,500+ projects, improving UI responsiveness by 40%, and achieving 75% faster deployments via CI/CD.
Prototyped AWS Amplify & Elastic Beanstalk hosting solutions, analysing multiple cloud platforms and reducing costs by 30%.
Mentored a new intern for 5 weeks, accelerating onboarding by 40% and reducing code review time by 25% through structured guidance and documentation.
Facilitated cross-team collaboration with 2+ teams and 5+ stakeholders, ensuring smooth alignment between business requirements and technical execution.

experiences.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Resolved a major outage by debugging with Chrome DevTools and optimising server configurations, collaborating with 4 service providers to minimise downtime and ensure a smooth resolution.

Developed and optimised responsive websites using WordPress, Elementor, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing UX/UI design, increasing page views by 55%, and reducing load times by 40% through modern web framework integration and performance analysis.

experiences.title: Webmaster (Casual)
description: Revamped website architecture and enhanced site navigation by integrating HTML, CSS, and Club Runner, modernising UI and improving user experience, resulting in a 40% increase in monthly active users and a 9.5/10 customer satisfaction score.
Collaborated with multiple teams and stakeholders to develop the official Rotary Queensland 9620 District Conference website, enhancing digital presence and accessibility.
